means: 自大的，狂妄的，胆大妄为的
使相信，使确信(assure的过去式)
使相信，使确信(assure的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: "I'll get the Republican nomination," he assured me. "It's in the bag."
sentence.Network_cn: “我会得到共和党提名的，”他向我保证，“这是十拿九稳的事。”

sentence.Network_en: I've assured him I have no plans to let him go.
sentence.Network_cn: 我向他保证，我绝对没打算让他走人。

sentence.Network_en: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
sentence.Network_cn: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 消防专业词汇英语翻译(A-C) -亿城英语 ... assured against fire 保过火险的 assured 被保险人 assurer 承保人.

GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... assuage v． 缓和，减轻 assured adj． 自信的，确定的 assurance n． 自信，保证.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... assuage v． 缓和，减轻 assured adj． 自信的，确定的 assurance n． 自信，保证.

list.abs: 新东方六级高频词汇整理_百度文库 ... array n. 陈列，一系列 assurance n. 保证 blame n. 责任.
昆山拿雅纳精密模具 ... 公司沿革 Our Histroy 质量保证 Quality Assurance 六标准差6- sigma.
首页-吉尼佛摄影专营店-淘宝网 ... 会员制度 MEMBER SYSTEM 品质保证 QUALITY ASSURANCE 联系我们 CONTACT US.
资产配置与投资时钟的应用 ... 技术服务业 Support Services 人寿保险 Life Assurance 休闲与酒店业 Leisure & Hotels.

entry.tran: 自信的；放松的；有把握的
entry.def: Someone who is assured is very confident and relaxed.

example.ex: He was infinitely more assured than in his more recent parliamentary appearances.
example.tran: 比起最近几次在国会中的露面，他表现得自信多了。

entry.def: If something is assured, it is certain to happen.

example.ex: Our victory is assured; nothing can stop us...
example.tran: 我们必胜，我们锐不可当。
昨天，她的未来似乎已经在握。

entry.tran: 确定的;信心十足的;志在必得的
entry.def: If you are assured of something, you are certain to get it or achieve it.

example.ex: Laura Davies is assured of a place in Europe's team...
example.tran: 劳拉·戴维斯确信能在欧洲队中占据一席之地。

example.ex: Bickerstaffe looks assured of being elected general secretary.
example.tran: 比克斯塔夫看上去对于当选总书记志在必得。

entry.def: If you say that someone can rest assured that something is the case, you mean that it is definitely the case, so they do not need to worry about it.

example.ex: Their parents can rest assured that their children's safety will be of paramount importance...
example.tran: 家长尽可放心，孩子们的安全将成为重中之重。

example.ex: Rest assured, he probably has rather more common sense than you realize.
example.tran: 放心吧，他知道的常识很可能比你以为的要多得多。

entry.def: You use rest assured when you want to emphasize your determination to do something.

example.ex: I will be seeing Mr and Mrs. Johnson. And rest assured I will tell them of your rudeness...
example.tran: 我将去见约翰逊夫妇。等着瞧吧，我一定会把你的无礼告诉他们。

example.ex: Rest assured, if you owe taxes, we will collect them.
example.tran: 不用多想，如果你欠税，我们会去收的。

sentences.sentence: "we can never have completely assured lives"

auth_sentence.content: Sam Beam's second album is assured and confident.
auth_sentence.res_content: Sam Beam's second album is assured and confident.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Sam Beam's second album is assured and confident.

auth_sentence.content: Please be assured that this is not the case.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please be assured that this is not the case.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please be assured that this is not the case.

auth_sentence.content: Rest assured, this is serious stuff, kids.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rest assured, this is serious stuff, kids.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rest assured, this is serious stuff, kids.

stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑

Sentence.sentence: After outlining the main points she would cover, she assured the audience that she would be happy to answer questions at the end of her presentation.
Recently, the UK National Stem Cell Network warned the UK could lose its place among the world leaders in stem cell research unless adequate funding and legislation could be assured.

means.word_mean: 深信无疑；非常肯定；(对…)很有信心

sentences.en: You can rest assured that we will do everything we can to get your money back.
sentences.cn: 你尽管放心，我们会想一切办法把你的钱要回来。
